channel.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
channel.description:
Hey i'm using devolution 7.0 server source and i had a really good idea and wondered if it's possible, I know dev sources are a bit limited in editing but anyway.....I was wondering if you could use the left half and the right half of a dragon square shield to make the shield, so pretty much what im asking is, is there a way to use one item on another to give you a particular item?
All Help Is Welcome And Appreciated :)

item.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Could You Send Me A Mopar Message With Your Email Man?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

For dueling:

Search this in client.java:

outStream.writeString("Duel

Delete that, and a code under it, and you can also delete that Attack option there, that everyone hates when your not in the wild.

For Smithing, just go in shops.cfg

and delete all the hammers out of the stores.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Kk and 1 more thing do you have a code so you can’t teleport whilst in combat because players start attacking something, then teleport, and then that npc has unlimited health and they keep gettin xp for standing there.

Also How Would I Fully Delete Smithing And Dueling…Just Search For “duel” in client.java and then dleet every paragraph about it?

alos i knwo theres a way to stop interfaces and if i do find it ill contact you immediately.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Well, with that I just had to plainly delete Dueling, and Smithing out of mine. (because I deleted hammers)

But after I gave you the code for the Dragon SQ Shield, I also added that to my server, and added it to drops, and when you use them together you get 5k Smithing EXP, so people can still train it.

Also a tip, Go on mopar client, get the ID of that Magic Guild Ladder leading into the Dungeon, Search it in client.java, and delete the case, so Player’s can’t noclip into Barrows.

Read full topic

anyway hope you can help thanx!

item.title: 2 Dragon Shield Halves
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In client.java search for:

if ((itemUsed ==

Once you found that, you might see something like this:

if ((itemUsed == 1061 ) && (useWith == 2357)) { deleteItem(1061, getItemSlot(1061), 1); deleteItem(2357, getItemSlot(2357), 1); addItem(2914, 1); }

Then after the } Add this:

if ((itemUsed == 2366 ) && (useWith == 2368)) { deleteItem(2366, getItemSlot(2366), 1); deleteItem(2368, getItemSlot(2368), 1); addItem(1187, 1); } if ((itemUsed == 2368 ) && (useWith == 2366)) { deleteItem(2366, getItemSlot(2366), 1); deleteItem(2368, getItemSlot(2368), 1); addItem(1187, 1); }

Read full topic
